title: A Smokeless Flame
description: Archaeologist Tori is just getting back on her feet, settling into a new job and a fresh start in Cairo following a messy break up, when the unthinkable happens. Her best friend and fellow archaeologist, Dahlia, is kidnapped one morning from their excavation site on the edge of a slum. As days pass with no new leads Tori starts desperately trying to piece together the riddle of Dahlia's disappearance on her own. She has little success until she gets an offer of help from a surprising source: A coworker who is really a mysterious jinniyah, a supernatural being that can shapeshift and conjure fire. Tori hesitates, reluctant to trust what she cannot understand. With Dahlia's fate hanging in the balance can she take a leap of faith before it's too late?
author: Aziza Amador
